doc.title: 'Reliance' and 'Shamrock III' Turning Outer Stake in Second Race
doc.plot: Showing the Reliance rounding the outer stake, four minutes ahead of Shamrock III. Both boats are kept in picture part of the time, and after following the Reliance up for a quarter of a mile the camera is again brought to bear on the stake in time to see Shamrock III come around and follow after the Reliance.

Showing the Reliance rounding the outer stake, four minutes ahead of Shamrock III. Both boats are kept in picture part of the time, and after following the Reliance up for a quarter of a mile the camera is again brought to bear on the stake in time to see Shamrock III come around and follow after the Reliance.
